message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Would you be able to accommodate this price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is really my bottom line. I could potentially come down to $17,000, but that's absolutely the lowest I can go.  What do you say?
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I am still looking for the best deal possible. I am willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Could we meet in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To be honest,  $15,000 is the absolute lowest I can go. I have another buyer interested at that price, but I'd rather see if we can make a deal work. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still hoping to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $13,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
